DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the missing rate of capsule endoscopy using back-to-back capsule endoscopy.
DOC.brief_title: Capsule Endoscopic Miss Rates Determined by Back-to-Back Capsule Endoscopy
DOC.criteria: Patients with obscure gastrointestinal bleeding Intestinal stenosis or obstruction Swallowing difficulty History of abdominal surgery History of radiation therapy for abdominal or pelvic lesion Age < 15 years Pregnancy Unstable vital sign or massive hematochezia Bleeding lesion, mass > 2 cm, or intestinal stenosis found by CT angiography
